data.message: Yo Slim,I hope you tear Nick Cannon and Mariah Carey a new one.Tell that drunk ass meth hoe to shut the fuck up and take her fake teeth out and suck some dick to make her useful.See,her twitter picture is in the shape of an H and that stands for Heather her real birth name.People think she is a queen but she's nothing but a fake ass meth whore that acts homeless in Colorado to get free drugs.Nick Cannon got his bitch stolen by a dude that's worth less than a 100k and thank god we never had sex cause the bitch caught HIV,i'm not making this shit up,look how wasted she is and people worship her and really she's a queen of fake shit in life,can't turn a hoe with dentures into a house wife.I don't give a fuck how much she's worth or how famous they are,they can both sit their drunk and high asses on that fucking runway.Slim,they can't sue me for so many reasons so I can say things like the reason she's skinny is because of all the speed balls she shoots up and her teeth are removable and white because of cum from every guy with a smile and a dime sack.In Obsessed she said,Last man on earth still couldn't hit this...Shit,go off of Nevada and Tejon in Colorado Springs with a speed ball and be sure and wrap it.Slim,tear them a new one and i'm not making this shit up just to bash on them,this is on the Holy Bible true shit.Let em have it.
